div.p:
Online user 1:
Hey wait a minuteâ€¦ Everyone is at risk for heart disease. All three of them are making high-risk choices. Doesn't that mean they're all going to get heart disease?

Online user 2:
Yeah, I mean, we all know that if you eat crappy food all day and don't go to the gym, you're gonna end up getting sick.

Online user 3:
I don't know though, we all know about that one guy who lives to be 100, and he eats junk food every day.

Online user 4:
I'd like to be like that guy, that's not a bad deal at all. I love cheese and bacon.
